data.title: VOLKS2: VLBI Observation for transient Localization Keen Searcher
data.name: volks2
data.description: VLBI Observation for single pulse Localization Keen Searcher, 2nd release

evidence: Owner metadata: owner_type is User and contact given as personal email and WeChat: "Please do not hesitate to contact me (E-mail: liulei@shao.ac.cn, WeChat: thirtyliu)"
"This is the second release of the VOLKS pipeline... VOLK2 is designed for single pulse search and localization in regular VLBI observations" (end users run the pipeline for VLBI data analysis).

"If you make use of VOLKS2 pipeline in your publication, we require that you quote the pipeline web address https://github.com/liulei/volks2" (distribution via GitHub source repo, no mention of package managers or binaries).
